pages.text: Most recipes in your altar need Pigment (the material, not the mod. You are playing that one, already).$(br2)Pigment comes in various colors and can be acquired by pulverizing gem shards via $(l:general/anvil_crushing)Anvil Crushing$().

pages.title: Mixing Pigment
pages.text: There is nothing more important to a upcoming artist than mixing the right paint. Unfortunately, you found that in the case of your Pigments, it's not nearly as easy as it initially seemed: The powders don't quite want to mix. The result is always a multicolored mass.$(br)You need an intermediate solution. The closeness to nature of your minerals suggests that nature must be both the source and the solution! Quickly you make a few notes and $(l:general:colored_trees)out tumbled a recipe$(), which looks very promising.
